title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 203.18 - Harry w. fowler, ruppert e. hutton, john b. hadik and landon thomas, jr
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 203.18 - Harry w. fowler, ruppert e. hutton, john b. hadik and landon thomas, jr

State Regulations

The Banking Board hereby grants permission for Harry W. Fowler, Ruppert E. Hutton, John B. Hadik and Landan Thomas, Jr. to be at the
same time directors and/or officers of Fiduciary Trust Company of New York
("Fiduciary New York") and directors and/or officers of Akimco International

Ltd., a Bahamian management company and a 50-percent-owned subsidiary of

Fiduciary Trust Company of New York (Geneva) S.A., a wholly-owned subsidiary of

Fiduciary New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
203.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
